## About me

I am an Assistant Professor in Statistics at the [Department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) (DEMS) of the [University of Milano-Bicocca](https://en.unimib.it).

I am member of the Italian Statistical Society ([SIS](https://www.sis-statistica.it/)), the International Society for Bayesian Analysis ([ISBA](https://bayesian.org/)), and their young sessions. 

I am the maintainer and one of the authors of the [`FlexReg`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/FlexReg/index.html) package on CRAN.

[**Research interests:**]{.text-primary} Compositional data analysis; Bayesian inference; Mixture models; Computational Statistics; Regression models for bounded responses; Latent topic models.
